channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Neighbours have left their rubbish outside another property, 21st August
item.description:
On the 16/8/2025 this was dumped. It is situated outside 25 Perch Street, E8. It was left there by a tenant from April Street. People are passing and adding to it.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): April Street, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Surface water drain outside 57/59 Avondale Road is blocked with litter and leaf debris preventing proper drainage when it rains, 21st August
item.description:
Surface water drain is blocked with debris consisting of leaves and rubbish preventing proper drainage of surface water

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Avondale Road, Sundridge, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large nitrous oxide cannisters left on the pavement ouside 83 and 81 Queen;s Drive, 21st August
item.description:
Large cannisters of nitrous oxide are regularly being left, often with other rubbish, under the trees outside nos 83 and 81 Queen's Drive. Six or so cannisters have been appearing every few days for weeks now.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Queens Drive, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Litter bins overflowing!, 21st August
item.description:

item.title: Fly-tipping of brown bin., 21st August
item.description:
